page.title: 15STOCKPORT: REDDISH VALE.
page.content: I like to play in{Reddish Vale.}The vale is part of the{Tame Valley}and has lots of grass and woods and there is a river winding through. The vale has rope swings and dirt paths which we slide down. It is a place where we can play without getting into trouble. I like playing on the river swing best because it is daring. Sometimes people fall in and get very wet. We make dens out of branches from the trees and cover them with things like cardboard and sheets of metal. The vale also has footpath slides which are steep paths covered in dust - great for wearing out your trousers as you slide down pretending to be skiing.
